message: I have a great opportunity for you to purchase a unique product that I think you'll really love. I'm looking to sell it to you for $10,000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $9,000.  Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand you're looking to pay $9,000, but I'm not quite ready to meet you there yet. I'm willing to compromise at $9,500. This is my final offer for now.
